lead_paragraph: The Ugandan government threatened to withdraw peacekeepers from Somalia after a report that accused its troops of war crimes in the Congo.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

headline.main: Uganda: A Threat to Pull Peacekeepers
